name: memories (itch) (swaghver)
description:
memories is a hidden-object game in which you try to regain your lost memories by finding objects related to them, in your old room from when you were 17 years old.

As we get older, memories start to fate away. You're widowed and alone in a retirement home. Plagued with Alzheimer's, you've lost your most beloved memories. Will you be able to remember them all?

  • Discover your old room again!
  • Recover memories lost to time!
  • Find peace within yourself!
